Package org.bukkit.event.entity

Class EntityListener

java.lang.Object
org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listener
public class EntityListener extends Object implements Listener
Handles all events fired in relation to entities

  • Method Details

    • onCreatureSpawn

      public void onCreatureSpawn(CreatureSpawnEvent event)
      Called when a creature is spawned into a world.

      If a Creature Spawn event is cancelled, the creature will not spawn.

      Parameters:
      event - Relevant event details

    • onEntityCombust

      public void onEntityCombust(EntityCombustEvent event)
      Called when an entity combusts due to the sun.

      If an Entity Combust event is cancelled, the entity will not combust.

      Parameters:
      event - Relevant event details

    • onCreeperPower

      public void onCreeperPower(CreeperPowerEvent event)
      Called when a Creeper is struck by lightning.

      If a Creeper Power event is cancelled, the Creeper will not be powered.

      Parameters:
      event - Relevant event details
